jd:
Job Title: Azure Full Stack .Net Developer (Hybrid)
Location: Hartford, CT
Duration: 12 Months
Client: State of Connecticut

Job Description:
OEC is seeking a skilled Application Developer with a strong background in .NET and Azure to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in developing applications using JavaScript and TypeScript, and a solid understanding of Azure architecture and deployment strategies.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and maintain scalable web applications using .NET, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
- Implement Azure services and solutions for application deployment and architecture.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
- Troubleshoot and debug applications, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.
- Participate in code reviews and contribute to team knowledge sharing.
- Communicate effectively with stakeholders to gather requirements and provide project updates.

Qualifications:
- Proven experience as an Application Developer with a focus on .NET technologies.
- Strong proficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript.
- Demonstrated experience with Azure architecture and deployment processes.
- Familiarity with front-end frameworks and libraries (e.g., Angular, React) is a plus.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Strong communication skills, with the ability to articulate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Agile development methodologies.
- Knowledge of DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines.
- Familiarity with database technologies such as SQL Server or Azure SQL.

Working Conditions:
- Hybrid work model requiring in-office presence one day a week.
- Collaborative team environment.
